title: Mother’s Day Present
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Hm... Hmmm...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Rina-chan, what’s wrong? You sound troubled.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah, Kanata-san. Hey, what did you do for Mother’s Day?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan made a super deluxe bento box~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I see. That makes sense since you’re great at cooking.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Rina-chan, are you lost on what to do for Mother’s Day?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah... My mother isn’t at home often, so it’s difficult to make a bento box for her. So is giving her flowers......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I see...... Hmm..... Okay, how about you take pictures of different places with blooming flowers and attach them to the letter? You have a lot you’d like to express, right, Rina-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>That’s true. I have a lot to say.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Alright, you should do that then~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>......Um, could you do me a favor, please? I want you to be in the pictures with me and the flowers. So that I can tell my mother that I’m having fun at school.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Really!? You want me to be in the pictures with you!? Yay~! Alright, then let’s go find a fabulous place to take the photos! Let’s goo~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
